page.title: 13A Riding Stable-Dorking NE
page.content: These stables were a bit like a farmyard.The partitions for the stables were crooked,the ground was {muddy}and there was hay and straw everywhere.{ They have{13 horses,}2 dogs (Jack Russells) and they used to have 4 goats and a foal. They ride on{Headley Heath}and they breed their own horses. Mr.Warrick employs 2 stable workers at the moment but he usually has 8 stable workers. The stables are cleaned out daily. He{feeds}his horses on chaff,sugar beet,nuts and molasses and he gets his food locally. The people who book rides mainly come from{London.}They teach clubs,schools and individuals. They used to have some special tack for{handicapped}riders.
